briefdescription.para: Relay status (registers 11-13) bit0: commanded, bit1: actual.
Check if register address is valid.

simplesect.para: true if address is within valid range

briefdescription.para: Construct a new Register Map object.

detaileddescription.para: Initializes all registers to default values

briefdescription.para: Read value from Modbus holding register.

simplesect.para: uint16_t Register value or 0xFFFF if invalid address

briefdescription.para: Write value to Modbus holding register.

simplesect.para: false if address invalid or register is read-only

briefdescription.para: Update registers from measurement point data.

detaileddescription.para:
point
Measurement point containing temperature data
Updates current, min, max temperatures and status flags

briefdescription.para: Apply configuration from registers to measurement point.

detaileddescription.para:
point
Measurement point to update with register values
Updates alarm thresholds in measurement point

briefdescription.para: Apply configuration from measurement point to registers.

detaileddescription.para:
point
Measurement point containing configuration
Updates register thresholds from measurement point

briefdescription.para: Get number of active DS18B20 sensors.
Get number of active PT1000 sensors.
Check if a command is pending execution.

simplesect.para: true if command needs to be processed

briefdescription.para: Get alarm configuration for a point.
Update relay status register with commanded and actual states.

parameterdescription.para: What the system wants the relay to be
Current hardware state of the relay

briefdescription.para: Manages Modbus register mapping for temperature monitoring.

detaileddescription.para: Provides a standardized register interface for external systems to access temperature data, device status, and configuration parameters. Implements Modbus holding register protocol with read/write capabilities.
